name: iPhone 15 Pro 128GB
description: Latest iPhone with A17 Pro chip, titanium design, and advanced camera system. Features USB-C connectivity, ProMotion display, and improved battery life.

name: MacBook Pro 14-inch M3
description: Professional laptop with M3 chip, 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, 16GB RAM, and 256GB SSD. Perfect for creative professionals and developers.

name: PlayStation 5 Console 1TB
description: Next-generation gaming console with ultra-high speed SSD, 4K gaming, ray tracing, and 3D audio. Includes one DualSense wireless controller.

name: Samsung 65-inch 4K Smart TV
description: Crystal UHD 4K processor, HDR support, built-in streaming apps, and voice control. Features multiple HDMI ports and sleek design.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise canceling with exceptional sound quality. 30-hour battery life, comfortable fit, and multipoint connectivity.

name: iPad Air 5th Generation
description: 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display with True Tone, M1 chip, 64GB storage, and supports Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Advanced health monitoring, fitness tracking, and seamless iPhone integration. Features always-on display and crash detection.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mirrorless Camera
description: Full-frame mirrorless camera with 20MP sensor, 4K video recording, and advanced autofocus system. Perfect for photography enthusiasts.
